channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: How Trump’s approval shifted after the ceasefire in Gaza, according to a new AP-NORC poll
item.description: A new AP-NORC poll finds that more U.S. adults support President Donald Trump’s handling of the conflict in Israel after he brokered a ceasefire deal in Gaza, but his approval ratings on domestic issues remain weak.

item.title: Alaska storm damage so bad many evacuees won’t go home for at least 18 months, governor says
Bolton pleads not guilty in Justice Department case accusing him of sharing government secrets
